book.synopsis: Desperate to end the dark curse that has tormented him for years, Jason Donavon finds salvation in the form of a beautiful woman who takes him to her primal world, where he is forced to confront the evil that lurks inside of him. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.15 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
